DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effectiveness vitamin B reduce temporomandibular joint disorder ( TMD ) pain . Patients randomise receive study drug placebo . The study drug use combination vitamin B1 ( thiamine mononitrate ) -242.5mg ; vitamin B6 ( pyridoxineHCl ) -250mg , vitamin B12 ( cyanocobalamin ) -1mg . We assess patient 's pain level , range jaw movement record side effect use medication .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Vitamin B Reducing Temporomandibular Joint Disorder Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Type study : Prospective double blind randomize control trial Sample population : patient temporomandibular joint disorder pain currently undergo treatment Oral & Maxillofacial surgery unit , Prince Philip Dental Hospital Study Period : 2 year ( 1st may2015 1st may 2017 ) Data Collection All new case exist TMD patient treat oral maxillofacial surgery department , Prince Philip Dental Hospital acquire screen base inclusion exclusion criterion . Selected patient categorise base TMD axis 1 diagnosis divide two group - group 1 ( Vitamin B ) group 2 ( placebo ) randomly . Allocation patient group base computer generate random block sequence . Complete social demographic background patient record accord follow format age , gender , race , education , job . Clinical assessment do check 1 . Mouth open 2 . Lateral excursion ( right left ) 3 . Protrusion 4 . Deviation low jaw open 5 . Tenderness muscle mastication 6 . Pain - base 10cm visual analog score . After initial assessment , patient start either vitamin B complex placebo base group . - Both group patient also prescribe Tab Ibuprofen 400mg take acute Temporomandibular joint ( TMJ ) pain symptom . - These patient review week 0,2,4 6 . - All patient review blind assessor . Each patient give log book document frequency TMJ pain attack , maximum pain score attack amount analgesic ( Ibuprofen 400mg tab ) take . - Log book record check review . - Amount analgesic record log book compliance Vitamin B placebo cross check remain tablet count . Data Evaluation/ Statistical Analyses The statistical analysis study use standard version Statistical Package Social Sciences ( SPSS ) version 17.0 window . All data gather enter software .
